Case Study: Probability (Cards)
Two friends, Rahul and Ravi, are playing a game with a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Rahul draws a card at random.

parts.i: What is the probability that the card drawn is a face card?
parts.ii: What is the probability that the card drawn is a Red Queen?
parts.iii: If all the Kings are removed from the deck, what is the probability of drawing an Ace?

Case Study: Trigonometry
A lighthouse is a tower, building, or other type of structure designed to emit light from a system of lamps and lenses and to serve as a navigational aid. A guard on top of a 100m high lighthouse observes a ship coming towards it. The angle of depression changes from $30^\circ$ to $45^\circ$.

parts.i: Draw a labeled diagram to represent the situation.
parts.ii: Find the distance of the ship from the lighthouse when the angle of depression is $45^\circ$.
parts.iii: Find the distance traveled by the ship during the period of observation.
